Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage.api.storage.disk

Interface IStorageDisk<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the storage
All Superinterfaces:
IStorage<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
FluidDriveWrapperStorageDisk, FluidStorageDisk, FluidStorageWrapperStorageDisk, ItemDriveWrapperStorageDisk, ItemStorageDisk, ItemStorageWrapperStorageDisk, PortableFluidStorageDisk, PortableItemStorageDisk, StorageDiskFluidManipulatorWrapper, StorageDiskItemManipulatorWrapper
public interface IStorageDisk<T> extends IStorage<T>
Represents a storage disk.

  • Method Details

    • getCapacity

      int getCapacity()
      Returns:
      the capacity of this storage disk

    • getOwner

      @Nullable UUID getOwner()
      Returns:
      the id of the owner, or null if not present

    • setSettings

      void setSettings(@Nullable IStorageDiskListener listener, IStorageDiskContainerContext context)
      When this storage disk is inserted into a storage disk container, it has to adjust to the container's settings and use the following parameters instead.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to be called when the storage changes, or null for no listener
      context - the container context, containing some settings

    • writeToNbt

      net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag writeToNbt()
      Writes the storage to NBT.

    • getFactoryId

      net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation getFactoryId()
      Returns:
      the factory id as registered in IStorageDiskRegistry
